com.extjs.gxt.ui.client.data
Class BaseLoader<D>

java.lang.Object
  com.extjs.gxt.ui.client.event.BaseObservable
      com.extjs.gxt.ui.client.data.BaseLoader<D>
Type Parameters:
D - the data type being returned by this loader
All Implemented Interfaces:
Loader<D>, Observable
Direct Known Subclasses:
BaseListLoader, BaseTreeLoader
public class BaseLoader<D>
extends BaseObservable
implements Loader<D>

Abstract base loader implementation.
